sense.def: Alternative Names ru shi fa dong 乳石發動 ; yao shi fa 藥石發 , outbreak of [stalactite] mineral drug [poisoning]; yao shi fa dong 藥石發動 ; fu shi du fa 服石毒發 , outbreak of poisoning after ingesting [stalactite] mineral; shi qi fa dong 石氣發動 , outbreak of [stalactite] mineral [poison] qi. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of poisoning following an ingestion of medication based on ru shi , often accompanied by restlessness, heat, thirst, obstruction- as well as impediment-illnesses, and red eyes. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 15: 乳石發 , 頭痛寒熱 , 胸中塞 , 日晡 手足煩疼方 , “Recipe for [treating] outbreak of stalactite mineral [ poisoning ], with headache, alternating sensations of cold and heat, and chest congestion, as well as vexing pain of the hands and feet in the late afternoon”.
